titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4818.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4818.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 866, H. Con. Res. 528 is considered passed House.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Young (FL) moved that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on the motion to suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment to H. Con. Res. 528.

POSTPONED ROLL CALL VOTE - At the conclusion of debate,the Chair put the question on adoption of the motion and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Obey demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question of adoption of the motion until later in the legislative day.

vote.text: On motion that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays (2/3 required): 381 - 0 (Roll No. 543).

reference.label: text as House agreed to Senate amendment

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make specified corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4818 (Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2005).
